creator: SICK AG
descriptionHtml:
Visualize your sensor data within your real application environment with the SICK SMART App.

For SICK sensors integrated into SICK Industry 4.0 customer applications, the SICK SMART App provides the possibility to visualize realtime sensor data within the actual application environment using augmented reality overlays.

Supported sensors:
- microScan3
- nanoScan3
- TiM
- LMS5xx

Demo Mode
In order to show the possibilities on how data is visualized in the app, a special demo mode is integrated which demonstrates the system's functionality without the need to connect to a real sensor.
All sensor data is simulated.
In order to enter this demo mode, please start the app and scan the attached QR code (which you can find under the 'Screenshots' section) when prompted to.

For more information about SICK sensors and SICK sensor solutions, please visit www.sick.com.
descriptionShort: SICK SMART is Industry 4.0 for your pocket.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: First version of SICK SMART app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

- Performance improvements
- Various bug fixes

title: SICK AR Assistant

creator: SICK AG
descriptionHtml: The SICK Augmented Reality Assistant (SARA) enables visualization of sensor data directly where the sensor is used. The SARA app brings together recorded sensor data and the real environment on the screen of the mobile end device. Data visualization speeds up troubleshooting and facilitates commissioning, for example by displaying warning fields and sites of object detection.
descriptionShort: SICK AR Assistant is Industry 4.0 for your pocket.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Improved app stability during sensor data visualization
- AR engine update for improved tracking stability
- Aligned app text
- Performance improvements
- Various bug fixes
